profile.summary: Skilled and driven QA Automation Tester, eager to contribute to team success through hard work, attention to detail and excellent organizational skills at every step of software testing lifecycle, and passion for the quality of the product under test. Experience in manual and automated WebUI and API Testing. Great communicator with colleagues striving towards an improvement in product quality and processes. Equipped with critical thinking skills. Skills set and experience in performing both automation and manual testing. Motivated to learn, grow and excel in QA Automation Testing.
profile.funFact: I do not know if this will sound much fun, but an interesting fact about me is that I have 360-photographed more than 50 spots in the UK and contributed to Google Street View. I am a Google Trusted Photographer :)

highlights: Worked on two mobile banking applications (business and personal digital banking applications)
Tested APIs in combination with web UI and mobile applications, and ensured data integrity and consistency between the UI and API in the database.
Created smoke test suites and integrated in CI/CD pipeline with Postman.
Tested digital banking features (e.g. customer onboarding, authorization, customer account/ledger operations etc.), both manually and with automated test scripts
Executed both automated and manual functional tests with Java RestAssured library, Postman, and Selenium WebDriver
Increased test coverage by writing robust test plans and test cases
Tested a repository of language learning apps and websites (e.g. Duolingo, Memrise, Road To IELTS, YouGlish, TedTalks, Tandem)
Improved students' technology adoption for language learning by training them how to test quality of web applications and mobile applications
Increased students' engagement with a series of online academic writing courses on FutureLearn platform by overseeing their learning activities and providing feedback

Conducted a systematic review of impact studies in global warming and climate change topics as part of a research project which is being conducted in collaboration with EuroMetrex (The Network of European Metropolitan Regions and Areas)

Analysing qualitative and quantitative data, maintaining accurate records of interviews, safeguarding the confidentiality of subjects, as necessary, summarizing interviews, providing ready access to all data for the principal supervisor, managing and responding to project-related correspondence.

work.position: English as a Foreign Language Teacher
highlights: Tested DPU Learning Management System to improve students' engagement with learning materials
Improved student motivation by upgrading Business/Finance English course content by liaising with business representatives and academics
Increased students' English vocabulary knowledge and command of speaking by testing the quality of and integrating language learning web applications
